meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ken Hill Mike Barrett Sam Stubblefield Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7164.

td.p: Ken Hill, a nuclear power plant inspector from Mauldin, South Carolina
Mike Barrett, a cashier and writer from Medford, Massachusetts
Sam Stubblefield, a hospital pediatrician from Wilmington, Delaware (whose 1-day cash winnings total $27,601)

tr.td: THE URGE TO MERGE
TIME CAPSULES
TEXTING ACRONYMS
COMPOSERS
2-WORD RHYMING PHRASES
POP CULTURE FROM BARTLETT'S
